attributes.action: Nation independent Inquiry into Grooming Gangs cover up or failure to prosecute
attributes.additional_details: Because there are people in local area office indirectly and directly involved in ignoring or hiding the truth about how the grooming went on for such a prolonged period of time and anyone who did not act on or pursue known information should be removed from office and/or prosecuted.
attributes.background:
Sanction a National independent inquiry.
National Inquiry of Grooming Gangs In particular any cover up or failure to pursue/prosecute by Local Council Members , social workers or police.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
